Flor seeks a loan to buy ingredients to make her food, such as cheese and chicken. With your help Flor will be able to succeed and improve her life!

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make her food, such as cheese and chicken.

loans.name: Eliza

texts.ru: Элиза, 30 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей школьного и дошкольного возраста. Образование-высшее экономическое. С 2003 года занимается торговлей коврами из Турции и занавесками производства - Китай. Для старта много лет назад у нее было только 100,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день бизнес достаточно развит. Элиза арендует помещение со складом за 30,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Ежемесячный доход на сегодняшний день составляет до 50,000 сом (KGS). Элиза обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 146,000 сом (KGS) на покупку ковров у оптовых продавцов для дальнейшей перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Элиза планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение ее бизнеса и мечтает накопить на покупку квартиры в новом доме.
texts.en: Eliza is 30 years old, married, and the mother of three children in elementary school and preschool.  She has a college degree in economics.  Since 2003, she has been selling carpets from Turkey as well as curtains manufactured in China.  When she started, many years ago, she only had a capital of 100,000 som (KGS).  Today, she has a well developed business.  Eliza leases a retail outlet and warehouse for 30,000 som (KGS) per month.  She currently makes a monthly income of up to 50,000 som (KGS).  Eliza has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 146,000 som (KGS) to buy carpets from wholesalers, in order to resell those on a retail basis.  She is planning to invest the earnings from her loan into further expanding her business.  She is also dreaming about saving enough money to buy an apartment in a new complex.

loans.use: to purchase carpets for retail sale in order to save money for a new apartment.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
A Sra. Maria de 44 anos de idade, viúva e mãe de 5 filhos todos são independente. Ela è negociante informal de produtos básicos actividade que esta a explorar a mais de 15 anos junto com os seus filhos no seu estabelecimento comercial, sustenta seu neto e a filha da irmã 
O presente empréstimo será aplicado para compra de produtos da 1a necessidade feijão, tomate, arroz, amendoim, caldos, alho, cebola, farinha de milho e mais diversos produtos para revenda.
texts.en:
Maria is 44 years old and a widow. She has five children, all of whom are independent. She's an informal vendor of household staples, a business she's been running alongside her children at her store for over 15 years. She supports her grandson and her daughter's sister.
The current loan will be used to purchase household staples such as beans, tomatoes, rice, peanuts, broths, onions, cornflour, and various other products for re-selling.

loans.use: to purchase household staples such as beans, tomatoes, rice, peanuts, broths, onions, cornflour, and various other products.

loans.name: Jhon Eugenio

texts.es:
Después de años de trabajar para una empresa textil, Jhon tomó su amor por el sector textil, dio un paso más y comenzó su propio negocio. 

En 2009, su negocio nació. La empresa fabrica colchones. A Jhon le encanta tener la libertad creativa para diseñar y fabricar sus productos de forma única. Sin embargo, se ha topado con dificultades de financiación de sus nuevas líneas de productos.

Este préstamo permitirá a Jhon para invertir en una motocicleta para realizar el transporte de sus insumos y sus pedidos pueda seguir creando nuevos diseños y transportarlos. 

En el futuro, que espera convertirse en una marca dominante en los segmentos minorista y mayorista de la industria. 

Él también espera mejorar la autosuficiencia de su empresa para que pueda pasar más tiempo con su familia.
texts.en:
After years of labor for a textile company, Jhon took his love for the textile sector a step further and opened his own business. In 2009 his business was born. His company makes mattresses.

Jhon loves the creative freedom to design and make his products in a unique way. However he has stumbled over difficulties in financing new product lines. This loan will permit Jhon to invest in a motorcycle to transport his supplies and his orders and he can continue to create new designs and transport them.

In the future he would like to become a dominate brand in the retail and wholesale segments of the industry. He also hopes to improve the sustainability of his business so that he can spend more time with his family.

loans.use: to invest in a motorcycle to transport his supplies.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.pt:
A Sra. Cristina de 42 anos de idade, mãe de 3 filhos que estão a frequentar a escola no ensino secundário. Ela é Pensionista Militar  também agricultora de sequeiro a mais de 20 anos, produz Mandioca, Feijão, Amendoim e Milho.
O presente empréstimo será aplicado na compra de material de construção (cimento, área, pedra e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para reabilitar a sua casa. Seu maior sonho e ver sua obra terminada de forma a garantir comodidade a sua familia.
texts.en:
Cristina is 42 years old and has three children who attend secondary school. She's a military pensioner. She has also been a dryland farmer for over 20 years. She growns manioc, beans, peanuts and corn.
The current loan will be used to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, rocks) and to pay for labor in order to repair her house. Her biggest dream is to see her construction work finished so that she can provide comfort for her family.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, rocks) and to pay for labor so that she can repair her house.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.pt:
A Sra. Teresa de 37 anos de idade, casada mãe de 06 filhos dos quais 3 esta independente e 3 estão a frequentar a escola no ensino primário e secundário. Ela é negociante informal de produtos da machamba, seus produtos compra em diferentes agricultores informal e formal para revender nos mercados da cidade de Maputo, com a venda desses produtos consegue sustentar a sua família e garantir a sua reforma.
Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos da machamba (feijão verde, cebola, tomate,repolho e mais diversos) para aumentar o volume do seu negocio e atingir outros mercados.
texts.en:
Teresa is 37 years old, married and the mother of six children of whom three are independent and three go to primary and secondary school.

Teresa is an informal trader of agricultural products. She buys her products from different farmers, both formal and informal, to resell in the markets of the city of Maputo. With the sale of these items she is able to support her family and ensure her renovations are carried out.

With this loan Teresa plans to buy agricultural products (green beans, onion, tomato, cabbage and other items) to increase her business's stock and sell her products at other markets.

loans.use: to buy agricultural products (green beans, onion, tomato, cabbage and other items) to increase her business's stock and sell her products at other markets

loans.name: Gs Cafe De Mi Tierra Group

texts.es:
El Señor Abelino, tiene 41 años de edad, es padre de 6  hijos, convive con su compañera de hogar, Su actividad es la producción y  venta de café cuenta con más de 16 años de dedicarse a esta  actividad este producto lo vende a intermediario en el municipio de Trojes, el cual le genera muy buenos ingresos.
Don Abelino está agradecido con la Prisma ya que los créditos que se le han otorgado han sido de provecho y ha tenido un crecimiento en su producción.  
Don Abelino con el crédito que solicita le contribuirá a tener una mayor producción de sus productos, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares y compromisos financieros, estos fondos el los necesita para la comrpa de abono y fertilizantes, ya que quiere tener una buena producción de café y un buen producto.
Don Abelino su sueños es mejorar las condiciones de vida de el y toda su familia, con el apoyo que reciba del préstamo le contribuirá a lograr sus sueños.
Santos y Noel  se dedican a la misma actividad de caficultura ya que las condiciones son favorables para dedicarse a este tipo de actividad.                                                                           


                                                                                       Trojes, Honduras - Marzo 2015
texts.en:
Abelino is 41 years old and has six children. He lives with his partner. He grows and sells coffee for a living. He has been doing this work for more than 16 years. He sells the coffee through an intermediary in the municipality of Trojes, which generates very good income for him.

Abelino is grateful to Prisma Honduras because the loans they have given to him have been useful and he has had an increase in his production.

The loan Abelino is requesting will help him to have a greater coffee output, which will enable him to improve his income to cover the family expenses and fulfil his financial commitments. He needs the loan to buy compost and fertilisers, since he wants to have a good coffee output and a good product.

Abelino’s dreams are to improve his living conditions as well as the living conditions of his entire family. The support he receives from the loan will help him to achieve his dreams.

Santos and Noel also make a living by growing coffee since the area has favourable conditions for this kind of work.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilisers for growing coffee

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es:
Flor de María tiene 42 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y gnadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de salchipapas y aguadito desde hace seis años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de mesas y sillas para arreglar su local y de esta manera atender a mayor cantidad de clientes generando mayores ingresos para su familia lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Flor de Maria is 42 years old, she lives with her husband and children in the district of Oyotún. In this community people make a living from agriculture, small business and cattle. Oyotún is located in Chiclayo Province which is in the Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru. 

Flor de Maria makes a living selling salchipapas (hot chips and hot-dogs) and chicken soup. She has been doing this for the last six years. 

Flor de Maria's business is located at the back of her home. She has plenty of experiences and good personal and professional references in the area. 

Flor de Maria is seeking a loan to buy tables and chairs for her small food stall and so be able to attend more customers. In this way Flor de Maria can increase her earnings for her family and allow them to have an improved quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs for her small food stall and so be able to attend more customers.

loans.name: Mairamkan

texts.ru: Майрамкан 44 года, вдова, мать 5 детей, самому младшему - 8 лет. Майрамкан работает в школе уборщицей, также получает пособие по потере кормильца, суммарно около 5,500 сом (KGS). Она знает как правильно использовать и планировать денежные средства для достижения поставленных целей. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством. Стартовав 25 лет назад, в хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, 15 овец. На участке мерою 1,0 Га она выращивает арбузы. Ежемесячный совокупный доход Майрамкан до 20,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян для парника и удобрений.  Доходы от кредита позволят Майрамкан развить ее бизнес, нарастить активы и построить сарай для скота.
texts.en: Mairamkan is 44 years old, a widow, and the mother of five children.  Her youngest child is 8 years old.  Mairamkan works as a cleaning lady in a school.  She also receives an allowance of about 5,500 som (KGS) for the loss of her husband.  She knows how to use and invest her money wisely in order to achieve the goals that she has set for herself.  She is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, two activities which constitute an additional source of income for her family.  She started those activities 25 years ago and she now has two cows and 15 sheep on her farm.  She also grows watermelons on one hectare of land.  She makes a total monthly income of up to 20,000 som (KGS).  She has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and is taking a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy seeds and fertilizers to be used in her greenhouse.  The earnings from her loan will allow her to grow her business, increase her assets and build a barn for her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds for her greenhouse in order to grow organic watermelons.

loans.name: Daniel Esteban

texts.es:
Daniel es un hombre con todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar el mundo y tener una vida plena gracias a sus esfuerzos.

Tiene un almacén en el que vende perfumes que el mismo prepara. Inicio el negocio hace 1 año y a pesar de su poco tiempo en funcionamiento ha tenido buena acogida en el sector.

El desea ampliar su oferta de productos y mejorar sus ventas inyectándole capital a su empresa, es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para darse la oportunidad de ser mas prospero. 

El dinero será invertido en la compra de materia prima como alcohol y esencias.

Tiene grandes esperanzas en su negocio y piensa que su futuro puede mejorar considerablemente gracias al apoyo de entidades como Interactuar que hacen lo posible para que las personas puedan soñar con una vida mejor y más estable.
texts.en:
Daniel is a man who has his act together in order to face the world and have a full life thanks to his efforts.

He has a store where he sells perfumes that he prepares himself. He began the business a year ago and, despite the short time he has been in business, he has been well received in the sector.

He wants to expand his product offering and improve his sales by injecting capital into his business; for this reason, he is requesting a loan in order to give himself the opportunity to thrive more.

The money will be invested in the purchase of supplies, such as alcohol and essences.

He has great hopes for his business and he thinks that his future can improve considerably thanks to the support of entities, such as Interactuar, who make it possible for people to dream of a better and more stable life.

loans.use: to buy supplies, such as alcohol and essences

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products and increase her sales, helping her to obtain a better quality of life with her family.

loans.name: Dolly

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajadora, así es Dolly, una mujer guerrera que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Puerto Salgar, donde se gana la vida con la preparación de alimentos variados como almuerzos y desayunos en un pequeño restaurante ubicado en su casa.

Trabaja sola todos los días durante 8 horas.

Sus alimentos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su restaurante porque saben que podrá comer de una manera deliciosa.

Dolly ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar sillas y mesas, así prestara un mejor servicio y atenderá a sus comensales de la mejor manera. 

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Humble and hard-working, that's Dolly. A warrior woman who dedicated a great part of her life to raising her children. She lives in the municipality of Puerto Salgar, where she makes a living cooking a variety of food for lunch and breakfast in small restaurant located within her house. She works alone everyday for 8 hours. Her food is well-known among neighbors in the area who visit her restaurant because they know it'll be a delicious experience. 

Dolly has decided to improve her business and increase her sales. For this reason she's looking for a loan to purchase chairs and tables. This will lend itself to better service and being able to attend to diners in a better way. This loan will allow her to move forward with her business and obtain the income necessary to have the opportunity to continue sustaining her family and business. Support this woman with a loan and she will achieve her dreams!

loans.use: comprar sillas y mesas, así prestara un mejor servicio y atenderá a sus comensales de la mejor manera.

loans.name: Giorgi

texts.en:
Giorgi, who is 68 years old and a married man, lives with his wife in Rustavi city. Both spouses are unemployed and their only source of income is from rent. Giorgi owns a commercial space in a good location in town and plans to start his own business in this place. 

Giorgi requested a loan but all the financial institutions rejected his loan requests because of his unstable financial conditions and lack of experience.  After several unsuccessful attempts, he applied for the credit to MFO Credo. His request was approved in the framework of the Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva, permitting the rural poor to start or re-start businesses. 

Giorgi will purchase all necessary tools and equipment for a small canteen and will start making a special meat dish that is very popular among local people. The Start Up credit will be a great support for the family, as their income will be significantly increased thanks to Kiva lenders. Giorgi awaits your support.

loans.use: To open a small canteen and start making a special meat dish

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
O Sr. António de 24 anos de idade casado e pai de 2 filhos dos quais 1 esta a frequentar a escola no ensino primário a outra sem idade para frequentar a escola. Ele è negociante informal de produtos  da 1a necessidade actividade que esta exerce com sua esposa em sua casa. Também é pintor a mais de 5 anos tendo aprendido durante a formação militar.
O presente empréstimo será aplicado na compra de produtos da 1a necessidade (arroz, refrigerantes, amendoim, cebola, feijão manteiga, tomate e mais diversos produtos para revenda.Seu maior Desafio e crescer mais seu negocio de forma garantir uma renda segura para familia, pelo que pagara o emprestimo sem entrar em moras
texts.en:
António is 24 years old, married and the father of two children, one of whom goes to primary school and the other is too young to go to school. António works an informal trader of basic needs products with his wife from their home. He has also been a painter for over five years, a profession that he learnt during military training.   

This loan will be used to buy basic needs products such as rice, soft drinks, peanuts, onions, beans, butter, tomatoes and various other products. António's biggest challenge is to expand his business further so that he can guarantee a secure income for his family and pay off his loan without falling behind in his payments.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products such as rice, soft drinks, peanuts, onions, beans, butter, tomatoes and various other products

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is forty-eight years old. She is a married woman, and they have nine children. She runs a green grocery stall and has been in business for three years. Her monthly income is 10,000 Kenya shillings.

This is Agnes's first loan with VisionFund Kenya LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to buy stock of kale, tomatoes, onions and potatoes. She plans to use the profits to pay for her children’s education. In future she aspires to have a dairy cow and a financially stable family.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes, onions, kale and potatoes for sale

loans.name: Katerina

texts.en:
Katerina is a market entrepreneur from Zaporozhye. She sells women's footwear in one of the biggest city markets. Katerina is married with two children. She is 34 years old, energetic and responsible. Moreover, she is very tolerant and courteous with customers. 

Katerina is hoping to boost her sales this spring season which is why she needs an additional 40,000 Grivnyas to invest in assorted demi-season boots, shoes and sandals. She is planning to continue developing her trade as she re-stocks her merchandise before the upcoming spring/summer season. In the future Katerina would love to buy out two vending kiosks to own them instead of having to pay high monthly rent.

loans.use: to buy assorted demi-season boots, shoes, and sandals so as to  boost her sales

loans.name: Luz Ceida

texts.es:
Luz, de 43 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de arepas en su casa ubicada en el municipio de Puerto Boyacá. 

Luz trabaja todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta la 1 de la tarde, es una mujer muy responsable, juiciosa y aplicada con su negocio.

Entre sus sueños más latentes esta el poder tener un restaurante en el que ofrezcan distintos tipos de alimentos y puede ofrecer empleos. 

Enfrenta múltiples dificultades como el costo de los insumos, la competencia en el sector y las fuertes lluvias que azotan su puesto de trabajo.

Ella pide un aliento económico para capitalizar su negocio y comprar insumos como harina, queso, entre otros.

El crédito impactara su vida y su negocio de un modo muy favorable pues podrá cumplir con su sueño con el tiempo.
texts.en:
Luz, who is 43 years old, has chosen to set up a business of selling arepas [a filled bread made from corn] in her home, which is located in the municipality of Puerto Boyacá.

Luz works every day from 6 in the morning to 1 in the afternoon. She is a very responsible woman, sensible and hard-working in her business. Among her most unrealized dreams is to be able to have a restaurant in which she can offer different types of foods and be able to provide jobs.

She faces a number of difficulties, such as the cost of the supplies, the competition in the area, and the strong rains that batter her work stall.

She is requesting some economic encouragement to capitalize her business and buy ingredients such as flour and cheese, among other items. The loan will impact her life and her business in a very favorable way, since she will be able to accomplish her dream with time.

loans.use: to capitalize her business by buying supplies such as flour and cheese, among other items.

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es:
Luis, con 51 años de edad, es separado y padre de 1 hijo. Se caracteriza por ser un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, un visionario y buen negociante. 

Siempre ha trabajado como comerciante, vendiendo joyería en el municipio de Rionegro y, desde hace 7 años tiene su propio negocio.  

Ha sabido superar tiempos difíciles en el comercio y sueña con comprarse su casa propia y tener un negocio que perdure en el tiempo; es por ello que Luis acudió a solicitar un préstamo, el cual utilizará para comprar surtido e inventario de joyería. 

Luis es un hombre muy organizado aunque ha tenido que enfrentar la competencia comercial del sector.  

La suma de todos sus esfuerzos le brindan a toda su familia una calidad de vida excelente.
texts.en:
Luis is 51 years old, separated and the father of one son. He is known for being a very responsible and hardworking man, a visionary and a good businessman. He has always worked as a vendor selling jewellery in the municipality of Rionegro and for the last seven years he has had his own business.

Luis has been able to overcome difficult times in business and he dreams of buying his own home and having a business that will stand the test of time. This is the reason why Luis has come to us to ask for a loan which he will use to buy a selection of jewellery. Luis is a very organised man although he has had to deal with competition in his area of trade. The sum of his efforts has provided his family with an excellent quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a selection of jewellery

loans.name: Elnur

texts.en:
Elnur is 43 years old. He is married and lives with his wife, two children, and his pensioner father in Gardabani district. Elnur serves local people as a taxi driver using his own car and generates income. 

Elnur wants to increase the family income and requested a loan to purchase a car. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 1500 USD to purchase a car. When the car is purchased, Elnur will resell it at a higher price to get additional income. With increased income he will provide better living conditions to his children.

loans.use: to purchase a car to resell in order to increase family income

loans.name: Tatiana

texts.en:
Tatiana is a small private entrepreneur from Melitopol. She is 51 and divorced. Tatiana has a grown daughter. She works at a local marketplace selling bathroom accessories, cleaning supplies and small bathroom furniture items. Tatiana launched this business over 15 years ago. At the moment she owns her vending location which is right next to a warehouse with all her merchandise.  

Tatiana is hoping to invest 31,000 Grivnyas in the purchase of plastic inventory items, as well as bathroom furniture. One of her main goals is to continue to expand her business, growing it and, thus, improving the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to purchase plastic inventory items, as well as bathroom furniture

loans.name: Larisa

texts.en:
Larisa is an entrepreneur from Melitopol. She is 51 and a widow. She owns a vending kiosk selling flowers. Moreover, Larisa also has several greenhouses where she grows different flowers which she then sells at her vending location. 

Larisa is planning to increase the variety of flowers she offers for sale in her kiosk before Easter which is celebrated on April 12 in Ukraine. Moreover, she would love to use some of the funds to change the interior of her kiosk, re-arranging her flower displays and designs. She is hoping to invest 40,000 Grivnyas in the purchase of flowers this time.

loans.use: to increase the variety of flowers she offers for sale in her kiosk before Easter

loans.name: Sebastian

texts.es:
Sebastián es un joven emprendedor y dinámico de 20 años de edad, estudiante universitario y comerciante independiente; ya que desde hace 2 meses comenzó a vender mercancía a sus familiares, amigos y compañeros de la universidad, con el fin de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía de su hogar y para pagar sus estudios.

El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para fortalecer su negocio, pues invertirá el dinero en la compra de surtido al por mayor como lociones, cremas, desodorantes, entre otros, brindando mayor variedad y un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo que hará más rentable su negocio.

Trabaja solo todos los días durante 8 horas.

Sebastián tiene el firme propósito de sacar adelante su proyecto productivo, pues quiere convertirse en un empresario exitoso y garantizar una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar para su grupo familiar y sabe que con los prestamistas de Kiva y la Corporación Interactuar puede lograr todo eso y más.
texts.en:
Sebastián is an enterprising and dynamic young man, age 20. He is a university student and an independent retailer, as two months ago he began selling merchandise to his family members, friends, and fellow students, for the purpose of generating income to contribute to his household finances and pay for his studies.

The loan that he is requesting is a support for strengthening his business, as he will invest the money in the purchase of wholesale merchandise such as lotions, creams, deodorants, etc., thereby providing his customers with more variety and better service, which will make his business more profitable.

He works alone every day for eight hours.

Sebastián is committed to moving his productive project forward, as he wants to become a successful entrepreneur, and guarantee a better quality of life and wellbeing for his family. He knows that with the Kiva lenders and Interactuar, he can achieve all this and more.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale merchandise such as lotions, creams, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, milk, salt, and lard for her business

loans.name: Edelcy

texts.es:
Edelcy es madre de 4 hijos y vive en unión libre. Aparte de su familia, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 30 años. 

Aprendió de este negocio empíricamente, es decir a través de la práctica y la observación de otras personas. 

Ella y su familia viven en zona rural de Turbo en la cual no es fácil tener acceso a servicios financieros como los que ofrece la Corporación Interactuar. 

Su crédito lo piensa usar en la compra de insumos agropecuarios como semillas, productos para el control de plagas, y abonos para realizar mantenimiento y sostenimiento a sus cultivos de plátano.

Gracias a este crédito, la economía y  calidad de vida de su familia mejoraría pues podrá aumentar sus ingresos. 

Edelcy sueña con tener una vida muy prospera al lado de sus hijos.
 
¡Impacte la vida de Edelcy y su familia con un crédito!
texts.en:
Edelcy is the mother of 4 children and she is in a common law marriage. Apart from taking care of her family, she has worked in agriculture for 30 years.  

She learned this business empirically, that is, through practice and by observing other people. 

She and her family live in a rural part of Turbo, where it isn't easy to access financial services such as the ones offered by the Corporación Interactuar. 

She plans on using the loan to buy agricultural materials such as seeds, pest control products, and fertilizer to do maintenance and support for her plantain crops. 

Thanks to this loan, her family's economy and quality of life will improve because she will be able to increase her income. 

Edelcy dreams of having a very prosperous life at her children's side. 
 
Impact Edelcy and her family's life with a loan!

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials such as seeds, pest control products, and fertilizer to do maintenance and support for her plantain crops.

loans.name: Nelson Andres

texts.es:
Nelson ha podido acumular grandes experiencias gratas en su vida, una de ellas es el haber podido trabajar en diferentes tiendas de abarrotes en el municipio de Cáceres.

Es un padre amoroso y responsable y tiene muy presente el significado de la familia en su proceso productivo.

El siempre fue muy inquieto y con gran vocación de servicio, cualidades que lo motivaron para iniciar con su propia tienda de abarrotes y hacerla muy reconocida en el sector.

Hoy en día es un hombre amable y muy emprendedor, siempre buscando alternativas para que sus clientes se sientan bien atendidos y comprando productos de calidad.

El solicita apoyo económico para obtener un préstamo y realizar la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar, pues planea aumentar su oferta de productos y desea tener un inventario mucho más grande, así podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes. 

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran distribuidora de víveres, considera que poco a poco y con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar puede lograrlo.
texts.en:
Nelson has been able to build up some great and pleasant experiences in life. One of them is having been able to work in various grocery stores in the municipality of Cáceres.

He is a loving and responsible father and keeps in mind the importance of the family in his production process.

He has always been very restless and with a great calling for service, qualities that motivated him to begin his own grocery store and make it very well known in the sector.

Now he is a friendly and very entrepreneurial man, always seeking alternatives so that his customers feel that they are well served and are buying quality products.

He is applying for economic support in order to obtain a loan and make the purchase of a stock of products for the family food basket, since he plans to increase his offering of products and wants to have a much greater inventory. Thus he will be able to have products available for his customers.

His great dream is to be able to have a big distributorship for groceries. He feels that little by little and with the help of the Interactuar Corporation, he can achieve it.

loans.use: to buy a stock of products for the family food basket

loans.name: Carmen Claudia

texts.es:
Carmen, junto a su esposo ha podido formar una unidad familiar y productiva bastante fuerte, ya que no solo prima el amor si no también los deseos de salir adelante y progresar como familia.

Ella se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos y pollos de levante, es una actividad aprendida de su esposo quien actualmente se dedica a esta actividad y ha sido la principal fuente de ingresos durante mucho tiempo.

Ella pide un auxilio económico para comprar algunos cerdos pequeños e irlos cuidando y criando para posteriormente venderlos.

Es una mujer soñadora y con gran voluntad, tanto así que ya piensa en grande y desea tener una marranera con gran capacidad.

Tiene gran ilusión y expectativa con este proyecto y confía en el buen corazón de los prestamistas de Kiva para crecer como empresaria.
texts.en:
Carmen and her husband have been able to form a very strong, productive family unit. This is because they don't just have love, but a wish to get ahead and progress as a family. 

She raises and sells pigs and broiler chickens. She learned this activity from her husband, who does this work. It has been their main source of income for a long time. 

She is asking for financial help to buy some piglets and care for them and raise them to later sell.

She is a woman with dreams and a strong will. She thinks big and she wants to have a large capacity pig farm. 

She has a lot of dreams and expectation with this project and she trusts in the good hearts of the Kiva lenders to grow as a business woman.

loans.use: to buy some piglets and care for them and raise them to later sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase energy-saving cookstoves to sell and make income to support her family.

loans.name: Stellah

texts.en:
Stellah is 43 years old and supports four family members. She has been in a hotel business for the last three years and earns KES 10,000 per month.

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy a dairy cow and get milk to sell. This will enable her to make more income to add more stock of items such as flour, rice and cooking oil for use in her hotel.

Her future hopes are to expand her business and be able to educate her children to higher levels of education.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow and get milk to sell, to enable her to make more income to add more stock of items for use in her hotel.

loans.name: Jose Raul

texts.es:
Jose es un hombre emprendedor de 28 años de edad, soltero y trabajador. 

Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado en diferentes talleres de confecciones como operario de máquina, razón por la cual posee experiencia y conocimientos en el manejo de este tipo de negocios; pero, ya cansado de trabajar en otros talleres y con el ánimo de pasar más tiempo con su familia, decidió emprender su propio taller de confección; por ello se anima a solicitar el crédito que será invertido en la compra de una maquina fileteadora, recubridora e insumos de confección como tela e hilos. 

Esto le permitirá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera generar un buen impacto en el sector para que le genere una rentabilidad favorable y así lograr cumplir el sueño de posicionarse en el mercado. 

Con su empuje y ambición se proyecta en un futuro a mediano plazo generando empleo siempre de la mano de la Corporación Interactuar
texts.en:
Jose is an enterprising 28 year old who is single and hardworking.  

During his productive life he has worked in different sewing workshops as a machine operator. That is why he has experience and knowledge in the management of this type of business. Tired of working in other shops and eager to spend more time with his family, he decided to open his own sewing shop. That is why he decided to ask for a loan to buy an over lock, serger machine and sewing materials such as fabric and thread. 

This will allow him to get his productive project going. He hopes to make an impact in the area so he can generate good profits and make his dream come true of having a position in the market. 

With his drive and ambition he plans on generating employment in the medium term, always with the help of Corporación Interactuar

loans.use: to buy an overlock and serger machine and sewing materials such as fabric and thread.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet is a repeat borrower in UGAFODE Microfinance Ltd. She is a married woman with children.

She owns a boda boda (motorcycle transport business), and an internet cafe and a restaurant. She has applied for a loan of UGX 3,000,000 to buy another motorcycle to boost her business and increase her income.

She is very grateful for the support UGAFODE Microfinance and Kiva lenders have always offered her and the people within her community, finances to boost their standard of living. Above all, she looks forward to accessing greater support today and in the near future.

loans.use: to complete the sum needed to buy  a motorcycle for her business

loans.name: Bakhdiar

texts.en:
Bakhdiar is 43 years old. He is married and lives with his wife in Gardabani district. Bakhdiar is an artisan and gets a small monthly income.

He decided to start a trading business. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 2,200 USD. With the received credit, he will purchase a stock of clothes to resell. His wife will also help to sell the clothes.

Bakhdiar thinks the business will be successful for his family, as he and his wife are very motivated.

loans.use: to begin a trade in clothes.

loans.name: Menensia

texts.en:
Menensia is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be humble.

She operates a retail business where she sells fruits and vegetables. She has been involved in this business for seven years. Her business is located in a good area, and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations.

She will use the KES 60,000 loan to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables.

Her business goal is to open another business outlet within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will own her own house.

This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Givi

texts.en:
Givi is 62 years old. He lives with his wife, son, and daughter-in-law in Dedoplistskaro district. Givi's wife trades in clothes and generates income.

Givi wants to start a taxi business in order to increase the family’s income. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 2,500 USD. With the received credit, Givi will purchase a car and will serve local people as a taxi driver.

Givi will be employed and will be able to improve the living conditions of his family. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a car and start a taxi business.

loans.name: Elvia Rosa

texts.es:
Elvia tiene 49 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa propia en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad donde la vida es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y comercio, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, hace 10 años, cuenta con experiencia en este sector y sus clientes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de cerdos, cuyes, patos, gallinas, entre otros animales para incrementar su negocio, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio de los mismos y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende va a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elvia is 49 years old and lives in a de facto relationship with one son in her care. She lives in her own home in a rural area which is located in the district of Oyotún, a community where life is calm and the residents work in agriculture and commerce. Oyotún is located in the province of Chiclayo in the region of Lambayeque on the north coast of Peru.

Elvia has raised and sold ranch animals such as chickens, hens, ducks, and turkeys, amongst others, for ten years. She has experience in this area and her customers have given her very good personal and work references. She is applying for a loan to buy pigs, guinea pigs, ducks, hens, and other animals to increase her business and satisfy the needs of her clients. This will have a positive impact on her level of income and as a result will improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs, guinea pigs, ducks, hens, and other animals to increase her business

loans.name: Maria Irma

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer casada, es una persona muy trabajadora y muy responsable, trabajó con su familia en  diferentes negocios donde adquirió experiencia en las ventas. 

Desde hace 1 año inició con una tienda de abarrotes para trabajarla como independiente y  labora desde durante 13 horas diarias al ver que su negocio de venta de sandalias no le daba resultados.

Maria sueña con tener un supermercado a futuro, por lo pronto con el crédito solicitado desea adquirir al por mayor una gran variedad de productos como verduras, granos, frutas, hortalizas etc., y poder brindarle a sus clientes artículos de excelente calidad. 

Con este negocio ha podido salir adelante poco a poco e intentara mejorar su vida y la de su familia al lado de la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva.
texts.en:
Maria is married, a very hard worker and very responsible. She has worked with her family in different businesses, where she acquired good experience in sales. Since a year ago, when she saw no results from her business selling sandals, she started working independently in a small grocery store, where she works 13 hours a day.

Maria dreams about owning a supermarket in the future, but for now she would like to acquire a large variety of products such as vegetables, grains, fruit, produce, etc. with the loan requested, and in this way, offer her clients items of excellent quality. With this business, she has been able to get ahead little by little and she will make an effort to improve her life and her family's, with the assistance of the "Interactuar" Corporation and Kiva lenders.

loans.use: acquire a large variety of products such as vegetables, grains, fruit, produce, etc.

loans.name: Eunice's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Eunice, often described as an extremely friendly person. She is 39 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is married and has three children.

Eunice is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again, as this means that she is able to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, which is why she decided to join in the first place. Eunice says that she is happy to have made that decision because, since she first joined in 2012, she has been able to consistently feed her family, which has improved her day-to-day life significantly. Eunice will also receive a solar light which she is very excited about as it will enable her reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. Eunice will use the profits from this season to buy a cow.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 4.75 acres and 10 solar lights between them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself as social. She operates a retail business where she sells flour, sugar, soap, vegetables and fruits. She has been involved in this business for six years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. She will use the KES 100,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, flour, vegetables, fruits and other items. Her business goal is to have a wholesale business within five years. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to open other business outlets.

loans.use: buy more stock of sugar, flour, vegetables, fruits and other items

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is 25 years old, married and is blessed with one child. She has a grocery stall and has been in the business for five years. Her monthly income is KES 10,000 and this has enabled her to provide for the needs of her family.

This is her first loan with VisionFund Kenya. She plans to use the loan to buy stock of maize and beans to sell and get more income. She plans to use the profits to educate her child.

In future she hopes to expand her business and open a grocery store and have a financially stable family.

loans.use: To buy stock of maize and beans to sell and get more income to support her family.

loans.name: Abdu

texts.en:
Abdu is 41 years old and married with one child who is 14 years old and attends school at the moment. He also has two dependents. He was motivated into beginning a human drug shop after realizing the need that was in the community; the only one there was insufficient to meet the demand. He has applied for a loan of 2,500,000 UGX to buy stock of human drugs that are in demand by the community.

He started the drug shop business in the year 2009 with high hopes of earning income to look after his family. He also has rentals in Kizinda T/C where he earns income to supplement his monthly income. His business is located in Nsumi, Kyamuhunga, Bushenyi District and his clients are all categories of people. He is a hardworking man who works eight hours a day, six days a week. He is faced with a challenge of competition but is ready to beat it through his hard work. He is determined to boost his business after getting a loan and achieve his long-term dream of becoming financially stable.

loans.use: To buy human drugs to sell

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is 21 years old. She is a married and they have four children. She runs a green grocery stall and has been in business for three years. Her monthly income is 10,000 Kenya shillings.

This is her first loan with VisionFund Kenya LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to buy stock of tomatoes, onions and potatoes. She plans to use the profits to buy clothing and food for her children. 

In future she aspires to have a dairy cow and financially stable family.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes, potatoes and onions for selling

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow to enable her meet the demands of her customers for the milk supply.

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es:
Con la ilusión de salir adelante y superarse, Luz desea montar un negocio de venta de helados en su casa en el municipio de Medellín.

Esta idea surge a partir de la motivación que le dio su hijo mayor que la impulsa para montar este negocio y así generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. 

Aunque ella siempre ha querido ser independiente, nunca había tenido el valor de arriesgarse a iniciar con un negocio; pero ahora se siente con la fuerza y capacidad para hacerlo.

Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar todos los elementos necesarios para el montaje de su negocio tales como 1 congelador, insumos e ingredientes para la preparación de helados, sillas y mesas.

Con estos elementos podrá iniciar con este proyecto y podrá cumplir así su sueño de ser independiente.

Con el apoyo a este crédito estarás impulsando las ideas emprendedoras de una madre colombiana!
texts.en:
With the dream of getting ahead and achieving, Luz wants to set up a business of selling ice cream in her home in the township of Medellín. This idea arose from the motivation that her older son gave her, which inspired her to set up this business and thus generate the income necessary for the sustenance of her household.

Even though she has always wanted to be independent, she never had the courage to take the risk to begin a business, but now she feels the strength and ability to do it.

She is applying for a loan to buy all the necessary items for setting up her business, such as a freezer, supplies and ingredients to prepare ice cream, and tables and chairs. With these elements, she will be able to begin this project and will thus be able to accomplish her dream of being independent.

With support for this loan, you will be powering the entrepreneurial ideas of a Colombian mother!

loans.use: to buy a freezer, supplies and ingredients to prepare ice cream, and tables and chairs.

loans.name: Kenzhebubu

texts.ru: Кенжебубу 54 года, вдова, мать 4 детей, самому младшему 15 лет. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав свой бизнес в 2003 году. Благодаря упорному труду Кенжебубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется корову, 2 лошади, 10 овец. На 1,74 Га она выращивает картофель и фасоль для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет - 10,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кенжебубу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы. Хорошее вложение в бизнес позволит в будущем увеличить доходы семьи и обеспечить детей достойной жизнью.
texts.en: Kenzhebubu is 54 years old, a widow, and the mother of four children.  Her youngest child is 15 years old.  She is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, two activities which constitute her family's main source of income and which she started in 2003.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has one cow, two horses and 10 sheep on her farm.  She grows potatoes and beans for resale on 1.74 hectare of land.  She makes a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS), which is not enough for a decent living.  For this reason, and in order to grow her farming business, Kenzhebubu has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy one cow.  This good business investment will allow her to increase her family's income in the future and give her the opportunity to provide a decent life to her children.

loans.use: to buy one cow in order to help bolster her income.

loans.name: Edgar Alfredo

texts.es:
Edgar es un joven emprendedor de 38 años, nació en La Paz – Bolivia, tiene dos hijos y vive junto a sus padres, quienes fueron su principal apoyo durante toda su vida. 
Edgar comenta que desde joven trabajo en el transporte público como conductor de un minibús y los ingresos que percibe los utiliza para apoyar económicamente en los gastos de su hogar. Edgar con mucho esfuerzo culminó sus estudios en la carrera de Mecánica Industrial en la Universidad Mayor de San Andrés y solicita un crédito educativo para poder especializarse en el área de Soldadura ya que considera que con los nuevos conocimientos adquiridos podrá optar a un mejor puesto de trabajo e incrementar sus ingresos los cuales le ayudaran a mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Su sueño es ser un excelente profesional y que su familia se sienta muy orgulloso de él. 
Edgar agradece de antemano a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos ayudan a otros y generan nuevas oportunidades de crecimiento.
texts.en:
Edgar, 38, is an enterprising young man.  He was born in La Paz, Bolivia; he has two children; and he lives with his parents who were his principal support for his whole life.
Edgar says that since he was young he has worked in public transportation as a minibus driver and the income he receives he uses to economically support the household expenses.  With much effort, Edgar finished his studies for a career in industrial mechanics at the Main University of San Andres and he is requesting a educational loan in order to specialize in the area of welding, since he thinks the with the newly acquired knowledge he will be able to opt for a better job and increase his income which will help him improve the life conditions of his family.  His dream is to be an excellent professional and that his family be very proud of him.
Edgar thanks all the people beforehand who through their economic resources help others and generate new opportunities for growth.

loans.use: to pay for his specialization in SMAW welding.

loans.name: Franz

texts.es:
Franz es un joven estudiante de 25 años, nació en La Paz – Bolivia, es soltero, y vive junto a su padre, quien le enseño a ser una persona de bien ya que lo educo y le inculco valores, a pesar de no contar con la presencia de su madre pues ella vive hace más de 20 años en otra ciudad.
Actualmente Franz trabaja como asistente en una empresa local y aprecia el hecho que valoren su trabajo, sus ingresos los utiliza básicamente para pagar sus estudios y ayudar a su padre en los gastos de su hogar. Con un gran esfuerzo logró ingresar a la universidad para cursar la carrera de Comercio Internacional y solicita un crédito educativo para poder cursar su último semestre y posteriormente graduarse ya que es uno de sus más grandes sueños. Franz indica que una vez que culmine su carrera piensa iniciar un emprendimiento propio y así brindar oportunidades de empleo a jóvenes profesionales. 
Franz agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos ayudan a otros a cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Franz, 25, is a young student.  He was born in La Paz, Bolivia; he is single; and he lives with his father who taught him to be a good person since he educated him and gave him values despite not having the presence of his mother since she has been living for 20 years in another city.
Nowadays Franz works as an assistant in a local company and appreciates the fact that they value his work.  He uses his income basically to pay for his studies and help his father with the household expenses.  With great effort, he managed to enter the university in order to pursue a career in International Commerce and he is requesting an educational loan in order to finish up the last semester and finally graduate which is one of his biggest dreams.  Franz indicates that once he finishes his course of study he is thinking of initiating his own entrepreneurship and thus offer employment opportunities to young professionals.
Franz thanks the people who through their economic resources help others to achieve their goals.

loans.use: to pay for his career in International Commerce.

loans.name: Maria Ana

texts.es:
Más de 13 años, tiene la señora María Ana de haber puesto una pulpería en su casa de habitación. Todo comenzó porque al vivir en una zona de alta comercialización, se dio cuenta que un negocio en esa área le sería beneficioso, por lo que con el pasar del tiempo obtuvo resultados y poco a poco pudo ampliar y tener un negocio sólido y próspero. 
Ella solicita el crédito para abastecer su pulpería con granos básicos, salsas de tomate, gaseosas, aceite, desodorante, sal, etc. Lo que le será de ayuda porque podrá continuar ofreciendo productos de calidad y en consiguiente sus ingresos aumentaran. Entre los planes a futuro de ella son poner otra sucursal y contar con personal que la apoye.
texts.en:
For more that 13 years, Señora María Ana has had a general store in her home.  It all began because she lived in an area of with lots of retail.  She realized that a business in that area would be beneficial to her.  And over time, she get results and little by little she could expand and have a solid and prosperous business.

She is requesting the loan to stock her general store with basic grain, tomato sauces, soft drinks, oils, deodorants, salt, etc.  It will help her because she will be able to continue offering quality products and consequently her income will increase.  Among her future plans are to start another branch and have staff to support it.

loans.use: To stock her general store with basic grains, tomato sauces, soft drinks, oils, deodorants, salt, etc.

loans.name: Raikul

texts.ru: Райкуль, 48 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее средне-специальное образование, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1990 году. Благодаря упорному труду, Райкуль на сегодняшний день имеет 3 коровы, лошадь и 15 овец. Также у нее есть 1,6 ГА собственной земельной доли и 2,0 ГА арендованной, на которой она выращивает фасоль, кукурузу, перец и картофель. Райкуль в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 телят для откорма и реализации, часть средств потратит на полеводство. Доходы от кредита Райкуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, что позволит направить средства на обучение ее детей.
texts.en: Raikul is 48 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She has a specialized secondary education and is involved in animal husbandry and crop farming.  These two activities, which she started in 1990, constitute her family's main source of income.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has three cows, one horse and 15 sheep on her farm.  She also grows beans, corn, pepper and potatoes on 1.6 hectare of her own land and 2 hectares of leased land.  Eager to further grow her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy four calves for fattening and resale.  She will also allocate some of her loan to her crop farming activity.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further expand her business, which will allow her to save toward her children's education.

loans.use: to buy four calves for fattening up and resale, and also to cultivate her land.

loans.name: Gs Cayantu Group

texts.es:
El señor Elio está casado, tiene 50 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos, habita en la Comunidad Cayantu, Trojes, al Oriente de Honduras, se dedica a la caficultura desde hace 10 años, su finca esta ubicada en una zona muy productora de café.
Don Elio está solicitando el préstamo para realizar el proyecto de fertilización de sus fincas. Ya que piensa que abonado mejor sus tierras le producirán mejor café que podrá vender más rápido y a un mejor precio.
Don Elio sueña con tener su finca en excelentes condiciones y que siempre le esté dando el sustento para su familia.
El grupo lo integran los siguientes miembros:
Santos de 38 años de edad, casado, tiene 2 hijos  quien también se dedica a la caficultura, desde hace 5 años.
Amanda de 52 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos  quien se dedica a engorde y venta de cerdos desde hace cinco años. 

Trojes, Honduras - Marzo de 2015
texts.en:
Sr. Elio is 50 years old, married, and has three children. He resides in the community of Cayantu, Trojes, which is eastern Honduras. Elio has been growing coffee for the past 10 years. His farm is located in a very productive coffee-producing area.

Don Elio is requesting a loan so that he can go about fertilizing his farm. He plans to fertilize his land well so that he can produce the best coffee, sell it quickly, and obtain the best price. Don Elio dreams of keeping his farm in excellent condition since it will always be the means of supporting his family.

The group also includes the following members:
• Santos is 38 years old, married, and has two children. He also grows coffee and has been doing this for five years.
• Amanda is 52 years old and has four children. She has been fattening and selling pigs for five years.

Trojes, Honduras - March 2015

loans.use: to buy compost for his coffee farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plantains, cassava, potatoes, oil, and other supplies.

loans.name: Ilda

texts.pt:
A Sra. Lda de 32  anos de idade casada mãe de  1 filha que esta a frequentar a escola no ensino secundaria, sustenta sua irmã que se encontra num Centro de Formação de Professores. Ela e negociante informal de produtos da 1a necessidade juntamente com seu esposa a mais de 12 anos no seu estabelecimento comercial.
O presente empréstimo será aplicado na compra de produtos da 1a necessidade (arroz, refrigerante, amendoim, feijão manteiga para revenda, tal como tem feito com os empréstimos anteriores.
Tem como grande desafio aumentar o volume do seu negocio para garantir a sua reforma.
texts.en:
Lda is 32 years of age, married and mother to a daughter who goes to secondary school. She also supports her sister who is currently going to a teacher training centre. Lda has worked for more than 12 years as an informal trader of basic needs products together with her husband in their retail business.

This loan will be used to buy basic needs products such as rice, soft drinks, peanuts, beans, butter and a variety of other products, just as she has done in previous loans. Her biggest challenge will be to increase the turnover of her business to ensure she can make repairs to her house.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products such as rice, soft drinks, peanuts, beans, butter and a variety of other products, just as she has done in previous loans

loans.name: Kalchahan

texts.ru: Калчахан 34 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Калчахан занимается полеводством и животноводством. Стартовав 10 лет назад, благодаря упорному труду Калчахан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 6 коров, 20 овец и лошадь. На 1,0 Га она выращивает рис. Ежемесячный доход Калчахан составляет 25,000 сомов (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Калчахан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS). Она планирует закупить коров для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Калчахан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Kalchahan is 34 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a secondary education. She is involved in crop farming and animal husbandry, two activities which constitute her family's main source of income and which she started 10 years ago.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has six cows, 20 sheep and one horse on her farm.  She also grows rice on one hectare of land.  She makes a monthly income of 25,000 som (KGS).  Eager to further grow her farming business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and is taking a loan of 150,000 som (KGS).  She is planning to buy cows for fattening.  She will resell her cows at the market at a higher price.  Kalchahan is planning to invest the earnings from her loan into further increasing her number of domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy a few cows for fattening up and resale.

loans.name: Evelin

texts.es:
Evelin es de la ciudad de San Ignacio, ella está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Agroindustrial, su meta es poder ser una profesional que pueda ayudar a la sociedad.
Ella es una persona que se está esforzando para poder ser alguien en la vida, y es por ello que está poniendo todo de sí.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder seguir luchando por sus metas.
texts.en:
Evelin is from the city of San Ignacio. She is studying for a degree in Agroindustrial Engineering. Her goal is to become a professional so that she can help society.

Evelin is a person who strives to make something out of her life. For this reason, she is doing everything she can to make this happen. She is requesting a loan so that she can pay her degree fees. This will allow her to continue striving toward her goals.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia vive en la ciudad de Encarnación, está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, está actualmente en el tercer año de su carrera.
Ella se está esforzando para poder dar un buen servicio a las personas de la sociedad, y también para poder ir mejorando su situación de vida y ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para cubrir sus gastos de universidad, y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Patricia lives in the city of Encarnación.  She is studying a career in nursing.  She is currently in the third year of her degree.

She is working hard to be able to give a good service to the people of the society, and also to be able to improve her life situation, and to help her family.

She is requesting this loan to cover the costs of the university, and with that be able to continue with her studies as she has done.

loans.use: To pay the costs of the university.

loans.name: Grover

texts.es:
Grover es un hombre de 21 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo de 5 meses, y su negocio es la agricultura.
Él es buen padre, paciente, constante, emprendedor, independiente, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en el ‘Chapare’ un área rural que se caracteriza por ser el granero de la ciudad, en este lugar se produce la mayoría de los alimentos que se comercializan en la ciudad, de clima templado con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 19-28 grados centígrados.
Grover es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al cultivo de la tierra y con su bebé. Viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y madera con techo de calamina que cuenta con energía eléctrica, para obtener agua deben aproximarse al arroyo que se encuentra a 10 minutos de caminata. Su negocio es la agricultura, los vegetales que produce mayormente son; la papa, el trigo, la quinua, la cebada, las habas, las arvejas y los cereales, también cuenta con algunas cabezas de ganado. “ingrese al trópico cuando era niño debido a la buenas cosechas, continúo aquí y deseo contar con servicios básicos…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que la producción tiene mucha demanda, la desventaja es que en el pueblo donde vive no cuenta con acceso a servicios básicos. Su sueño es contar con agua potable en su hogar, el desea realizar la conexión de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería para ofrecerle a su Bebé un hogar cómodo donde vivir. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que desarrolla esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Grover solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua potable en su cocina baño y lavandería para brindarle a su Bebé un hogar cómodo dónde pueda crecer.
texts.en:
Grover is a 21 year old man, he lives with his partner, he has a five month old son, and he is a farmer.

He is a good father, patient, consistent, enterprising, independent, responsible, and hardworking.  His business is located in "Chapare," a rural area that is known for being the breadbasket of the city.  In this place they produce the majority of the food that they sell in the city.  It is a temperate climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 19º-28º C.

Grover is dark skinned, has short black hair and brown eyes, is short, and is thin.  His mother tongue is Quechua that he speaks in the place and he speaks Spanish in the general culture and for the business that he does.  He shares his life with his partner, who makes a living cultivating the land, and with his baby.  They live in their own house that is made of brick and wood with a tin roof that has electricity.  To get water, they should go to a stream that is a ten minutes walk.

His business is farming.  The vegetables that he produces are mainly potato, wheat, quinoa, barley, lima beans, peas, and cereals.  He also has a few heads of cattle.  "I entered the tropics when I was a kid due to the good harvests.  I stay here and want to have basic services," he says.  The advantage of his business is that the produce has a high of demand.  The disadvantage is that the town where he lives does not have access to basic services.

His dream is to have potable water in his house.  He wants to connect potable water in his kitchen, bathroom, and laundry room to give his baby a comfortable home in which to live.  This is the first sequence of loans with the institution in the four years that he has been doing his job independently.

It is for these reasons that Grover is requesting a loan to install potable water in his kitchen, bathroom, and laundry home to give his baby a comfortable home where he can grow up.

loans.use: To install potable water in his kitchen, bathroom, and laundry room to give his baby a comfortable home where he can grow up.

loans.name: Danny Daniel

texts.es:
En el Cantón El Carmen su principal ingreso económico  es por el cultivo de  plátano, cacao, maracuyá, yuca y otros productos de ciclo corto. La zona es reconocida por el ecoturismo y la riqueza de su flora y fauna, goza de paisajes naturales extraordinarios,  esta zona goza de un exquisito clima tropical. 
En este lugar vive el señor Danny,  tiene 32  años de edad, es soltero y  tiene una hijade 12 años que estudia en el colegio, vive en una casa arrendada.
Don Danny es mecánico de motos que para obtener sus propios recursos  repara motos a personas particulares en su taller, tiene un operador que se hace cargo del taller cuando él no está.  También en su casa vende electrodomésticos, no tiene horario fijo para hacer las ventas las mismas que realiza recorriendo la localidad, deja a créditos los electrodomésticos y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene algún tiempo dedicando a estas actividades y le va muy bien, lo que más vende son los ventiladores.
Este crédito es para comprar repuestos para motos y ventiladores. Está en el Grupo De Crédito cuatro años y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer. Su sueño es tener un taller de motos bien grande y un local de electrodomésticos para no tener que hacer los recorridos buscando clientes.
texts.en:
The main income-producing activity in the canton of El Carmen is the cultivation of bananas, cacao, passion fruit, and other short-cycle crops. This area is also known for ecotourism due to the rich flora and fauna, the extraordinary landscapes that people can enjoy, and its exquisite tropical climate.

Sr. Danny lives in this place. He is 32 years old, single, and has a 12-year-old daughter who is in high school. He lives in a rented house.

Don Danny is a motorcycle mechanic. He earns his own income by repairing motorcycles for private individuals at his workshop. He has one employee who looks after the shop when he is not there. Danny also sells electrical appliances from his home. He does not have a set schedule for making sales or for traveling around town. Danny sells the appliances on credit and collects payment every eight days. He has the time to dedicate to these activities and is doing very well. The products that he sells the most are fans.

This loan will be used to buy motorcycle spare parts and fans. Danny has been with his Communal Bank for four years and enjoys being a member because the payment terms are convenient. His dream is to have a large motorcycle repair shop and an appliance store so that he does not have to travel around looking for customers.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts and fans.

loans.name: Soprimas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por tres mujeres (Karen Margiana, Pearl Mae  y Reynali) de la  ciudad de Bilwi, Puerto Cabezas. Son mujeres emprendedoras que luchan  por hacer crecer sus pequeños negocios de: venta de ropa nueva, pulpería y venta de cosméticos y productos de belleza por catálogos. Con el crédito otorgado anteriormente por Pana Pana y financiado por KIVA, les permitió a las tres integrantes del grupo incrementar un poco más sus inventarios, diversificar los productos y mejorar sus ingresos porque han logrado vender más.

Pearl Mae: Es integrante del grupo solidario, es una mujer trabajadora, casada. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos, desde hace 4 años vende frijoles cosidos, frutas, de esta manera aporta con los gastos del hogar. Solicita financiamiento para diversificar su negocio y comprar una paca mixta, así incrementar sus ingresos. Su sueño es tener un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
This solidarity group consists of three women (Karen Margiana, Pearl Mae, and Reynali) who are from the city of Bilwi, Puerto Cabezas. They are enterprising women who are striving to grow their small businesses: selling new clothes, managing a grocery store, and selling cosmetics and beauty products through catalogs. With the previous loan they obtained through Pana Pana and Kiva, the three members of this group were able to increase their inventories slightly, diversify their products, and improve their earnings because they were able to sell more.

Pearl Mae is a member of this solidarity group. She is married and a hardworking woman. Four years ago, with the intention of having her own source of income, she began selling cooked beans and fruit in order to help with the household expenses. Pearl Mae is requesting a loan so that she can diversify her business. She will buy a mixed bale of clothes so that she can increase her income. Her dream is to have a prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy a mixed bale of clothes.

loans.name: Rabiyahan

texts.ru: Рабияхан, 50 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она работает бухгалтером, также уже много лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Рабияхан, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 11 коров. Также есть земельный надел мерою 0,73 ГА и арендованной - 1,0 ГА, где она выращивает кукурузу и клевет. Ежемесячный доход Рабияхан составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Рабияхан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для закупки коров. Рабияхан намерена и дальше увеличивать поголовье скота и развивать ее бизнес.
texts.en:
Rabiyahan is 50 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She has a college education and works as an accountant, an activity which constitutes her family's main source of income.  In addition, she has been involved in animal husbandry and crop farming for many years.  Thanks to her perseverance, dedication and hard work, she currently has 11 cows on her farm.  She also grows corn and clover on 0.73 hectare of her own land and on another hectare of leased land.  She makes a monthly income of about 15,000 som (KGS).

Rabiyahan has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and is taking a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy a few cows.  She intends to increase the size of her herd and grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional cows for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Gloria Patricia

texts.es:
Gloria es madre de dos hijos de 14 y 9 años de edad; desde hace aproximadamente 20 años se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica y que surgió de la necesidad de generar recursos para el sustento de su familia; ofrece todo tipo de productos como ropa, perfumería, cremas corporales, accesorios, entre otros y cuenta con la ventaja de que diariamente conoce nuevas personas a las que les puede ofrecer su mercancía, mejorando cada día sus ventas. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar mercancía al por mayor como blusas, jeans, zapatos, accesorios, perfumería, entre otros, así podrá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en esta temporada; mejorando su nivel de ingresos.

Gloria, con empeño y dedicación, desea seguir trabajando para sacar adelante su negocio, ya que para un futuro cercano, sueña con tener la posibilidad de montar un almacén en un local comercial donde pueda ofrecer mayor variedad de artículos y que le genere una rentabilidad y una estabilidad económica favorable para dar a sus hijos una excelente educación y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria is the mother of two children, ages 14 and 9.  For approximately 20 years, she has worked as an independent retailer, an occupation that she learned through experience, and that arose out of the need to generate money to provide for her family. She sells all kinds of products, such as clothing, perfume, body cream, accessories, and other things, and she has the benefit of meeting new people to whom she can offer her merchandise every day, improving her sales daily.

At the present time, she is requesting a loan to purchase wholesale merchandise, such as blouses, jeans, shoes, accessories, and perfume, among other things.  In this way, she will be able to stock a greater variety in order to satisfy this season’s increased demand, thus improving her income level.

Gloria, with dedication and commitment, wants to keep working to take her business forward, as in the near future she hopes to have the opportunity to set up a store in a commercial space where she could offer a greater variety of items and generate a profit, providing the financial stability that would make it possible for her to give her children an excellent education and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale merchandise, such as blouses, jeans, shoes, accessories, and perfume, among other things.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor estudia para ser abogado, se esta esforzando para poder ser alguien en la vida, y por medio de su profesión tener mejores ingresos para poder ayudar a su hija. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en pagar sus cuotas, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda.
Hoy el pide este préstamo para poder pagar nuevamente sus cuotas, ya que con ello podrá seguir con sus estudios, luchando por una vida mejor como profesional.
texts.en:
Victor is studying to be a lawyer.  He is striving to be able to be someone in life, and through his profession to have better income to be able to help his daughter.  He says that he used his previous loan to pay his fees, which was very helpful.

Today he is requesting this loan to be able to pay his fees again, since with this he will be able to continue with his studies, fighting for a better life as a professional.

loans.use: To pay university fees.

loans.name: Berta Lorena

texts.es: Berta de 43 años de edad es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica a la comercialización de prendas de vestir, actividad que realiza desde hace 15 años y que le ha permitido sacar adelante a sus hijos, también con el apoyo de su esposo  que se dedica a elaborar estructuras metálicas. Berta habita en vivienda propia al lado de su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 15 y 18 años de edad. Berta desea invertir en su negocio ya que sabe que entre más productos tiene para ofrecer mejores son sus ganancias, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisetas, etc., y de esta manera obtener mejores ingresos que le permitan brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
